title: M2TW - Grand Campaign Hotseat - Egypt #1 - The Blood Bath Begins
description:
Hey Guys!  Today I start another Hotseat Campaign.  But this time it is a Grand Campaign Hotseat!  17 youtubers are fighting for the Known world!  Who will be the last one standing!  Enjoy :D

Turn order (factions with less initial regions go first):
1: SCOTLAND - xDagger - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuP8EyRRXJ-EWuO289Ynk7w
2: RUSSIA - TSAR - https://www.youtube.com/user/TsarOfBulgaria
3: DENMARK - Swissman15 - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClk-5xVdzgEoXxS4vFjQ5SA
4: MILAN - Watcherofthelich - https://www.youtube.com/user/Watcherofthelich
5: PORTUGAL - The Wise Coffin - https://www.youtube.com/user/TheWiseCoffin
6: HUNGARY - DeliciousTZM - https://www.youtube.com/user/DeliCiousTZM
7: SPAIN - TW Zone - https://www.youtube.com/user/xtotalwarzone
8: SICILY - Captain Invisible - https://www.youtube.com/user/CaptainInvisible1
9: POLAND - LegendofTotalWar - https://www.youtube.com/user/LegendofTotalWar
10: VENICE - NazeBaze - https://www.youtube.com/user/nazebaze
11: EGYPT - Pixelated Apollo - https://www.youtube.com/user/PixelatedApollo1
12: ENGLAND - Rampaned - https://www.youtube.com/user/Rampaned
13: MOORS - Incoherencel - https://www.youtube.com/user/Incoherencel
14: TURKS - CosmicConqueror - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoDbM78JreFfew3vaAgOprg
15: HOLY ROMAN EMPIRE -Drahcir - https://www.youtube.com/user/DrahcirSidnal
16: BYZANTINE EMPIRE - SaxonKing1225 - https://www.youtube.com/user/SaxonKing1225
17: FRANCE - TWFan - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVA84wFFo_B_BC6YbudjfBA

Rules and extra info: http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?684085-Retrofit-Hotseat-for-youtube-commentators

Grand Retrofit Mod:http://www.twcenter.net/forums/downloads.php?do=file&id=1581


Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelatedapollo
How to send me battle replays: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nG3uZoDkCU
How to play Medieval 2 Online: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGfItCMitPg
